description: The Deer of the Kokiri Forest were said to have keen senses beyond that of most animals, almost as if they could predict the future of their hunters.
tooltip: The deer of the Kokiri Forest were said to have keen senses beyond that of most animals, almost as if they could predict the future of their hunters. Buck Riders, Doe Trotters, and Stag Chariots gain 15% vision range.)
